AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Lens Decipher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a Decipher that directly modulates light through various lenses. To be honest, it is very tedious and tedious work for several Maru to stick together and fix the lenses one by one. However, [PAWN_pronoun] did not give up, as it is certain that Sari's interpretation is eventually guaranteed to result in some way.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru keychain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is Maru who makes ceremonial copies of rare artifacts called 'keys'. The original key looks like an ordinary stone slab, but it is a relic with information stacked on every side, from the outside to the inside. Of course, [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't have the technical skills to make that possible, so it's all about mimicking the structure as much as possible, but the fake key she created is still widely used by numerous organizations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru record analyst
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a records analyst who expertly collates and analyzes all the records of previous generations of Maru regarding sari and ancestors. Since most of the core research groups are diversified around a small number of deciphers or producers, they often operate a large number of telegrams to obtain various information in various places.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Goods peddler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is the Snowfield Carrier. Wearing thick clothes, they roam the snow, selling goods and information, and sometimes even taking on the role of a repairman.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Librarian of the Valley
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a librarian in the Great Repository. The vast amount of information and saris that have been accumulated from generation to generation are loaned to Deciphers and mountain keepers who have completed certification, and they are returned with additional information. The information obtained in this way is recorded by the clerk and managed in a bookshelf named after the borrower.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Decipher of the Spire
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a Decipher who lives in the middle of a long line of sotdaes. The sotdae there acts as a lightning rod for the plasma column that strikes in the middle of the night, and because of its shape at that moment, it is called a spire by the Maru who live in the area. [PAWN_pronoun] investigated this phenomenon and formulated several theories, some of which prompted other Deciphers to take seriously the story of the world on the other side of the earth.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru heir Decipher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a Decipher exploring the origins of Maru. Some say that the sari itself made from Maru's body symbolizes Maru's legitimacy, but [PAWN_possessive] thinks differently. If Maru is just a gene vessel like a tower for storing relics, what if the true successor of 'ancestor' exists separately? Then, with the suspicion that we not only inherited the knowledge of our ancestors, but we were also given the role of finding and protecting them, we are collecting all the information found in relics so far and conducting research to prove the origin of Maru.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru clerk of bookshelf
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is the clerk of the huge sarira archive. Its main task is to record the new material by writing down the words of sarira and the borrowers to whom the books were provided when returning the items, along with additional information. Except for the time of the borrower's return, the clerks mainly perform the role of the decipher. [PAWN_pronoun] is the clerk of the sarira archive and the main lender at the same time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru solver clerk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is the clerk of the huge sarira archive. Its main task is to record the new material by writing down the words of sarira and the borrowers to whom the books were provided when returning the items, along with additional information. However, there are often situations where it is impossible to return the rental item due to unavoidable circumstances. [PAWN_pronoun] is also responsible for resolving such situations. If the borrower dies in a dangerous area, we dig into the dangerous area, and if the rental item is lost, we restore the record or collect the corresponding sarira.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru sociable clerk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is the clerk of the huge sarira archive. Its main task is to record the new material by writing down the words of sarira and the borrowers to whom the books were provided when returning the items, along with additional information. In the process, the ability to open the lender's mind and let them say more than is necessary is invaluable. [PAWN_pronoun] is a particularly lively and sociable Maru, gifted with such abilities.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru bedbug
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a bedbug. No one knows how to live in someone else's house without doing anything productive, but surprisingly, the evaluation among the landlords where [PAWN_pronoun] was staying seems to be good.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru wandering doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a wandering doctor. They are wandering around the planet with no family, no friends, no place to return to. [PAWN_pronoun] who doesn't even start anymore for fear of losing might be called a coward or a loser. But {PAWN_possessive} must love every dying life until life ends in the cold snow. \n{PAWN_possessive} parents did.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru lazy hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a pretty lazy hunter. Of course, being able to be lazy in such a barren environment is only possible with that much ability. [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of one day abducting a good wife and lounging around doing only the dishes she likes, and is sharpening the blade of the harpoon today.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Boundary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is the border of the town. All day long, standing vigilantly and gazing over the mountain, is the whole of my daily routine. It's not something I really want to do, but there's nothing I'm good at, so I'm living a boring life of just doing the right thing to make a living.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru plumbing technician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is the solver's plumbing engineer. If the information processing unit of the interpreter acts like the lens of the eye that receives and aligns disordered information, the pipes connected to it play the same role as the optic nerves that receive the information and convert it into appropriate information. In other words, to put it simply by borrowing her own expression, [PAWN_pronoun] is an incredibly advanced engineer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru epicurean
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a foodie. He traveled the world to find the taste he wanted, experimenting with different foods, exploring different ingredients, and learning different recipes. Hoping to experience the best taste for myself someday.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru wandering doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a doctor who wanders the continent. [PAWN_pronoun], who is always chasing the smell of blood to find patients who need him, may be Maru, a happy Maru, which is rare on this planet that is always overflowing with patients.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru communicator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a communicator between villages. She has faster feet than anyone else, and is open to other news so as not to be interrupted. [PAWN_possessive]'s dream is to one day become the best storyteller in town, and for that dream, [PAWN_pronoun] runs along the road, taking everything she sees into her heart.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru ascetic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a wandering attendant. At some point, I came to want the ascetic itself, not the ascetic for enlightenment, but I firmly believe that as I continue to practice, that nature will also come off someday.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru full-time chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is the pack's exclusive chef. As with any Maru, [PAWN_pronoun], who has dreamed of becoming a chef since childhood, has finally achieved her dream, and is cooking while holding her waving tail.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru famous chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a famous chef. Like any other Maru, [PAWN_pronoun] challenged his dream, gave up everything and continued his efforts to reach the stagnation of his dream. \n\nBut [PAWN_pronoun] didn't change anything. Dreams, glory, and honor are only momentary pleasures, and it is a belated realization that [PAWN_pronoun] does not make [PAWN_pronoun] happy just because [PAWN_pronoun] rises to the top. ￦nAgain, [PAWN_pronoun] is wandering the world in search of true happiness.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Aether Seeker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} has been studying a substance or concept called ether for a long time. While accumulating knowledge in various fields for research, I came to know that it was related to the missing ancestors, but beyond that, it was just a field of hypotheses and no tangible results were obtained. Although they haven't given up on their original purpose yet, they are wandering the world with some skepticism.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru apprentice cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is an apprentice cook. It's been a few months since I went under her to learn to cook under a great chef, and although she's still washing the dishes, she's waiting for the day she'll catch a knife by herself, keeping her eyes shining.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru cowardly hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: PAWN_nameDef} is a particularly timid hunter. However, at the same time, the hunter's instincts are particularly strong. For example, when catching a small rabbit, it trembles, but when it encounters a really dangerous prey, its eyes change. [PAWN_pronoun] is the most semantically out of character hunt, but nonetheless other Maru are willing to trust and turn their backs on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru sniper archer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a sniper archer. [PAWN_pronoun], who wields an unusually sized mechanical bow and delivers silent death from mountain to mountain, is tasked with warning the threat forces from invading Maru's hive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru incense burner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was in charge of maintaining the ceremonial etheric incense burner unearthed as an artifact. Until all the incense burners disappear silently across the planet. After the incident, exchanges between towns revealed that [PAWN_possessive] wasn't at fault. But until then, [PAWN_pronoun]'s rebukes and gazes were not enough for one person, and after swallowing countless tears, [PAWN_pronoun] forgot how to speak.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru bow artisan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a bow artisan who makes bows and arrows. Experimental remodeling is repeated for more powerful power, and design and refinement are constantly repeated so that each part is interlocked and there is no wastage of power. Since the Maru's bow is a weapon for killing, not hunting, [PAWN_pronoun] makes bows with more care and thought than other weaponsmiths. With the expectation that a weapon capable of directly and accurately killing a person, which has been castrated with a device that keeps people away from the scene, such as a button, will be a deterrent that keeps people from killing people by its very existence.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru village architect
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is the leader of the pioneer group. Your main task is to find a suitable area to live in and design the village to fit the terrain. ￦n However, one day, by chance, an accident occurs in which most of the members of the [PAWN_possessive] group are trapped in the basement of a building and burn to death. In the very building [PAWN_pronoun] designed and built. [PAWN_pronoun], who had no choice but to watch the scene right in front of him with a grate in the middle, was shocked. After a lot of hard work after that incident, they managed to shake it off, but I still can smell the terrible smell of burning people when I look at the flame.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Carpenter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a carpenter. It sells convenience to numerous Maru, and sometimes makes ornaments such as Sotdae with leftover materials to give life to the Maru of the village. [PAWN_pronoun] is enjoying such a small life and happiness generously.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Ruins Explorer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is Maru exploring small ruins. Even though he doesn't dare to explore the more serious and dangerous ruins of the Mountain Keeper, he's a lively Maru whose drive is unmatched by anyone else.
